newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Nordson rated outperform.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Nordson rated outperform.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securities Inc said Wednesday it raised its intermediate- and long-term ratings on Nordson Corp to outperform from market performer.
-- It also increased its fiscal 1997 earnings per share estimate on the company to $3.42 from $3.35. It established a fiscal 1998 estimate of $3.87.
-- "Our near-term and long-term price targets are $67 and $71, respectively," said analyst Quint Nufer in a report.
-- Nordson was trading at 55-3/8, off 1-5/8. - Chicago Newsdesk 312 408-8787
